channel.title: Clojures on Programming & Computer Science
channel.description: Recent content in Clojures on Programming & Computer Science

item.title: Functional Approach
item.description: The on-going assumption is that programming is all about data transformation. Let’s see how we achieve this with functions.

item.title: Getting Your Hands Dirty
item.description: Learning Clojure requires you to install Clojure. Luckily, contrary to common belief, Clojure compiler is as simple as a single file.
